lines.text:
[At bath scene]
Stand up.
What you going to do?
I'm going to rinse you off.
But why?
So you don't itch.
But...
Look at you!
[Checking out her body]
I am woman -
[Proudly showing off her development]
Ready. Juicy, too!
[Lida is upset when her lover falls asleep in bed even though she's wearing nothing but a thick coat of honey]
I'm all dressed up and no place to go!
You say that we never found ecstasy... that it was quicksilver, always promising next time. Angel, I want ecstasy. Let's find it!
Do everything to me. Show me how I can do everything to you.
In the way of love, we're kindergarten toddlers.
I had so many years of being so very proper. I had good-girl claustrophobia.
[Even though she rides her horse naked, she can't arouse Angel]
You're a hard man to seduce.
[Not realizing he has been gored in the groin, Lida thinks Angel still can make love to her]
Now pay attention and concentrate on what I'm gonna say. This thing is going to work!
I've come all this way to give you something you may not even want - my virginity.
[Lida complains that, if her virginity isn't taken immediately, it will spoil]
The fruit is so ripe, it's ready to fall off the tree.
I haven't been in my home country until I left.
I hope you think I am as beautiful with my clothes off as I think you are.
